body_html:
@petewarden another thought .. as I understand it .. TF embedded/ TF mobile is designed to work with a pre trained model and extend it(a form of transfer learning). This appears to be mostly for images. My qs is .. is the idea being explored to use other models in this way ex for non image? many thanks rgds ajit

PS to elaborate(updated) applications like these which are mostly time series IoT sensors but with the main motivation that they do not send all the data to the cloud. This means mostly some form of LSTM in first guess. but was curious if the TF embedded community is exploring also non image based apps on the edge Real-Time Data Reduction at the Network Edge of Internet-of-Things Systems
https://pdfs.semanticscholar.org/5186/642aeda8afad207b13fbf9fd52f23d73c039.pdf
